name: Content Lock
author: Ryan Street

sections.description:
Show or hide content with a simple to use shortcode system. You can access or restrict content for:

  • Logged in/out users
  • different user types, (author, administrator, etc.)
  • different user roles and capabilities
  • URL Keys
  • password entry (good to show teasers, etc)
  • show/hide clickable links
sections.installation: 1. Installation is ready upon activation of plugin. Simply use the shortcodes inside your pages and posts.
sections.faq: None at this time, it is a new plugin! I will post these as I receive them on the forums.
sections.changelog:
1.0 – “Talos”
A giant forged from bronze by Hephaestus, and gifted by Zeus to his lover Europa as her personal protector, Talos protects your content like that of a great bronze giant.

short_description: Show or hide some or all of your content by wrapping it in convenient shortcodes!
description:
Show or hide content with a simple to use shortcode system. You can access or restrict content for:

  • Logged in/out users
  • different user types, (author, administrator, etc.)
  • different user roles and capabilities
  • URL Keys
  • password entry (good to show teasers, etc)
  • show/hide clickable links

upgrade_notice: Initial Release. No upgrade required at this time.
